nodes.bodyText: Is there a reason why these need to be made public? I would make these private and increase the accessibility as needed (I suspect they wouldn't need to be made higher than protected)
Just an oversight on my end, thinking if private would not work without getters and setters, then I would just use public. Makes sense to have them protected. 👍
This file change shouldn't be committed
Hey @formalhaut69 and @aldebaran30701 if the genfiles have changed then they should be committed. Normally genfiles change when you add new dependencies between modules.
